name: micv
description:
BEFORE YOU PLAY:

1. This is a very early release of the game and I don't guarantee any playability. There's a lot of bugs to be fixed and I will appreciate any feedback.

2. The logic system is a bit confusing, so please READ THE TUTORIAL in the game menu.

3. I am fully aware that this is a scrap mechanic rip-off. I am working on this game just because I want to see how far I can get just by myself and I am only publishing it to see if people on the internet like my work.

4. I know that many people don't like pink. I will add the option to change the color in a future update.

5. I'd like to thank my friend CNR Weiner for the models.

Known bugs (will be fixed soon):

    physics issues with rigidbodies acting like they didn't disappear.

    jumping is really unnatural.

    dragging objects is really glitchy.

Planned features/improvements:

    gears in gear blocks will rotate

    servo blocks will have gears in them

    the ability to control more inputs from one seat

    multiplayer
